title: Where’s Caleb Ewan? Botched Transfer Leaves Aussie Ace in Limbo at Start of 2025
content:
Multiple sources confirm Ewan is facing uncertainty after requesting an exit from his existing contract and a planned transfer fell through.

Read the full article at Where’s Caleb Ewan? Botched Transfer Leaves Aussie Ace in Limbo at Start of 2025 on Velo.
author: ahood
